definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Danyun (Red-Cloud) Valley, a name which compares the red leaves to red clouds.
sentences.chinese: 丹雲峽，把成片的紅葉比作紅色的雲彩。

sentences.english: There is wind everyday in this summer, and there are masses of clouds floating in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 這個夏天每天都有風，並且有大片的雲彩飄來飄去。

sentences.english: We looked to the east. The clouds were reddish and then turned bright red.
sentences.chinese: 我們仰望東方，只見雲彩由微紅變到鮮紅。

sentences.english: Might as well be in a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 雲彩的勢力之下也一樣皎潔。

sentences.english: Because of the nature of impermanence within the clouds, the river suffered very much.
sentences.chinese: 雲彩那變化無常的本性，可讓小河受盡了苦頭。

sentences.english: Clouds float in the sky and a creek flows past the town.
sentences.chinese: 雲彩在藍天漂盪，小溪流過小鎮。

sentences.english: The yellow dust of the road rose like a cloud under the horses' feet.
sentences.chinese: 路的黃色塵土上升了象雲彩在馬的腳之下。

sentences.english: Which the clouds do drop and distil upon man abundantly.
sentences.chinese: 雲彩將雨落下，沛然降與世人。

sentences.english: To the rosy clouds in the western sky.
sentences.chinese: 對着西方天空裏玫瑰色的雲彩。

sentences.english: The Awakened One allows things to come and go like clouds in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 覺者允許事物像天空中的雲彩一樣自由地來去。

sentences.english: One day she noticed the clouds within herself.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，她在自己的身上看到了雲彩。

sentences.english: A cloud drifted by and covered the moon.
sentences.chinese: 飄過來一片雲彩擋住了月亮。

sentences.english: Yu Yuncai was appointed Deputy Director-General of the Industry and Commerce Administration of Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 任命於雲彩爲湖南省工商行政管理局副局長。

sentences.english: But clouds that sail across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 但當朵朵雲彩在天際飄過。

sentences.english: The moon was hidden by clouds.

definition: Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
